select group_concat(`id`) ids ,group_concat(`fanPower`) fanPowers from blowerset where `frostPower` >0 and coldStorageId in(${ids}) GROUP BY `coldStorageId`
select group_concat(`id`) ids ,group_concat(`frostPower`) frostPowers from blowerset where `frostPower` >0 and coldStorageId in(${ids}) GROUP BY `coldStorageId`
